EmailTemplate.name: Disqualified.Disqualified
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners / {{lead.Full Name:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
It's been some time since we last spoke, I wanted to reach out and let you know we have expanded our list of services which may now make it feasible for you to work with us.
We recently launched a new Web site <http://www.mbopartners.com/> with a set of powerful tools; one of those will help you determine if we are the right fit <http://www.mbopartners.com/#rightforyou>.
I wanted to share these tools with you personally, and encourage you to take a quick look.
Perhaps you are happily independent now, and have found a solution to manage your business life -- or you may have returned to working full time, or perhaps be in the midst of a search.
Whatever your work life stage, I hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independence in America has arrived. Our company just released news of a major national study – the first-ever national baseline to size and track the independent work sector <http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence>. It’s part of a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view the study’s very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation.
I do hope you will take time to learn if MBO Partners is right for you or not <http://www.mbopartners.com/#rightforyou>. Please stay in touch and let me know how I can help further your career.
{{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} Consultant Services Advisor
MBO Partners
t: {{lead.EM Phone:default=703-793-6011}} f: 703-793-6081 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=sarhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
